hymn.title: Being diligent to keep the oneness of the Spirit

layout.singingstanza: Being dil -- i -- gent to keep the one -- ness of the Spir -- it in the u -- nit -- ing bond of peace: One Bod -- y and one Spir -- it, e -- ven as al -- so you were called in one hope, in one hope of your call -- [skip2] ing; One Lord, one faith, one bap -- ti -- sm; One God and Fa -- ther of all, who is o -- ver all and through all and in all.

lyrics.stanza: Being diligent to keep the oneness Of the Spirit In the uniting bond of peace:
